body.name: Anolon 87538 Smart Stack Hard Anodized Nonstick Frying Pan / Fry Pan / Hard Anodized Skillet - 12 Inch, Black
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 6 hrs 7 mins
features: SLICK PERFORMANCE: This versatile frying pan features an ultra-durable nonstick surface that outlasts traditional nonstick by up 16X, so your creations glide off the pan easily for years to come.

LOCK AND LOAD: Protect your nonstick from everyday wear and tear. When Anolon SmartStack cookware pieces stack together, the patented interlocking handles prevent nonstick surfaces from scratching against each other.
TOUGH CUSTOMER: Nonstick frying pan is engineered for fast, perfectly uniform heating. Hard-anodized construction is twice as hard as stainless steel for maximum durability.
FINE FINISHES: Stackable frying pan has an easy to clean, stain-resistant nonstick exterior finish that keeps the pan looking newer, longer.
A BETTER COOKING SURFACE: Flat rivets on the inside of the skillet provide a totally smooth cookware surface for sublime stirring and easy cleanup
HOW IT WORKS: Anolon SmartStack cookware pieces stack together to help you stay organized with nesting cookware sets that use 62% less space in the cabinet or cupboard
body.description: Stack your cookware and save cabinet space with this hard-anodized nonstick frying pan from Anolon SmartStack. Designed for big performance in small spaces, this nonstick skillet complements other items in the SmartStack collection to give you all the pieces you need in just two short stacks under 13-inches to save 62% more storage space. Patented interlocking handles keep pans suspended to protect the nonstick surface, and all the pieces stack together to help you stay organized. Durable hard-anodized aluminum construction heats quickly and evenly to avoid hotspots, and the Infinity Slide™ System provides optimal nonstick performance. Perfect for ambitious chefs in smaller kitchens, Anolon SmartStack pots and pans provide all of the durability and performance features of our pioneering hard-anodized nonstick cookware with the convenience of a small footprint in the cabinet. Dishwasher safe for quick cleanup, and oven safe to 400°F, Anolon SmartStack cookware features a full-cap stainless steel base that prevents warping and is suitable for all stovetops, including induction. For quality-minded home chefs who are low on storage space, Anolon SmartStack is the nonstick that fits.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great frying pan
reviews.reviewText: Awesome frying pan. Easy to clean. Non stick. The food cooks perfectly in this pan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for cooking eggs
reviews.reviewText: I have used this skillet for the better part of a year now to cook scrambled eggs, usually at least twice a week. I think it probably has the best non-stick performance of the many pans I have had over the years. This one is non-stick without any help such as added oil, and seems to be maintaining its state better than most. I use this on an induction plate, and it works well. The deep form factor is nice too. However, I am not too excited about the handle design. It is not uncomfortable, but the hook to allow the pan to stack with others isn't a helpful feature when I don't have other pans to stack with it. I thought I would need to cut it off, but it hasn't proven enough of a nuisance to do so. Also this one arrived with a slight chip in the coating surface from handling, I doubt it was from the manufacturer, since most of my Amazon packages arrive pretty beat up in my rural location. I almost sent the pan back, but I'm glad I didn't. The chip thankfully hasn't affected function. I will probably buy this one again if/when it wears out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great pan! It truly works like a non stick pan should. I use this pan nearly every day and its holding up well. Have purchased several of them for my family and friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Anolon Smart Stack Hard Anodized Nonstick Frying Pan Set and I'm mostly satisfied with my purchase. As someone who enjoys cooking and experimenting with different recipes, I was looking for a high-quality frying pan set that would be versatile and easy to use, and this set has definitely delivered on those fronts.One of the things I love most about the Anolon frying pan set is the nonstick surface. It's very effective at preventing food from sticking, which makes cooking and cleaning a breeze. The pans are also very durable – the hard anodized construction is resistant to scratches and wear, and the pans feel very solid and well-made.I also appreciate the stackable design of the pans. They're very convenient to store, and the lids fit securely, which makes it easy to stack them and save space in my kitchen cabinets.However, there are a couple of things that I'm not as happy with. The first is the handle – while it's comfortable to hold, it doesn't stay cool to the touch when the pan is on the stove, which can be inconvenient. The second is the price – while the pans are high-quality and well-made, I do feel like they're a bit pricey compared to similar products on the market.Overall, I'm mostly satisfied with the Anolon Smart Stack Hard Anodized Nonstick Frying Pan Set. It's a high-quality and versatile set that's easy to use and clean, but the handle and the price are a couple of drawbacks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Non-stick really means non-stick
reviews.reviewText: I waited over a year to write this review because let's face it, everything is 4-5 stars out of the box. Plus, in my experience "non-stick" cookware usually starts to fail after around a year. So with that said, I am very impressed with this product so far. Even now it's the most "non-stick" non-stick cookware I've ever owned. Not a drop of oil is needed; even eggs release easily for a hand flip that always impresses the kids. Although there are now a few flaws and scratches in the cooking surfaces due to normal wear and tear and some accidental burning of food, it still functions perfectly. Cleanup is a breeze. We follow the care instructions pretty closely, so keep that in mind as well. All in all this is proving to be an excellent purchase. It looks great too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to handle and to clean. Non-stick.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered used items and they arrived strangely packed with a used roll of masking tape and debris inside. They were not packed to protect the non-stick surface, but loose, and freely scraping against one another in the large box. (No paper or other soft packing to protect the pans.) HOWEVER, I did buy them used, and maybe saved about 10 dollars and noticed only a few small scratches on one of the pans. I tire of returning items and thought one gets what one pays for. Final thoughts after using the scratched pan, it seems to work well. And it cooks everything nicely without sticking, and it is easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product…this is the workhorse of my kitchenM

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the way it stacks ...but I thought it was made like analonX this doesn't sear or cook as well as analonX would . A bit disappointed in this set
This is a great pan so far. Too early to tell if it will stand up to wash and wear
Tried frying eggs in frying pan but they stuck. So not sure how happy I am with this set.
Very easy to clean I don't have to put it in my dishwasher. I'm able to fry eggs without any oil. These are excellent frying pans. I wish I had these before I purchased the Teflon coated pans.

It is light weight it's very easy to handle, definitely non-stick I can fry an egg without any oil, easy to manually clean, heat is evenly distributed it's easy to fry an omelet or pancakes. Don't waste your money buying cheaper brands like I did before. I highly recommend buying this Anolon Frying Pans (and pots).
